title: Burrata Brussels Sprouts Pizza
directions: Flour your surface and roll pizza dough out to your desired size; transfer dough to a baking sheet or pizza stone.
Drizzle dough with olive oil, then add red pepper, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Top that with the havarti and parmesan cheese, then add the brussels sprouts, red onion and pancetta.
Bake pizza for 15 minutes, or until crust is golden and sprouts are cooked. Remove from oven, then place burrata cheese on top and wait 5 minutes for it to melt.
Top with microgreens (optional), slice and enjoy!
